00027 class Path {

00052 template<typename Type>
00053 Path<Type>::Path(){
00054     startTime = endTime = 0;
00055     isCyclic = false;

00068     endTime = timeToEnd;

00076 template<typename Type>
00077 Path<Type> Path<Type>::operator =(Path<Type> toEqual) {
00078     startTime = toEqual.startTime;
00079     endTime = toEqual.endTime;
00080     isCyclic = toEqual.isCyclic;
00081 
00082     points.resize(toEqual.points.size());
00083     for (int i = 0; i < toEqual.points.size(); i++) {
00084         points[i] = toEqual.points[i];
00085     }
00086 
00087     return *this;
00088 }

00154 template<typename Type>
00155 Type Path<Type>::getPoint() {
00156     return getPoint(SDLLoader::getTime());
00157 }
00158 
00166 template<typename Type>
00167 Type Path<Type>::getPoint(int time) {
00168     if (points.size() == 0) {
00169         return Type(0,0,0);
00170     }
00171 
00172     int timeRange = endTime - startTime;
00173     int timeLocation = 0;
00174 
00175     if (isCyclic) {
00176         timeLocation = (time - startTime) % timeRange;
00177     } else {
00178         timeLocation = (time - startTime);
00179     }
00180 
00181     double timeStep = (double)timeRange/(points.size() - 1*(!isCyclic));
00182 
00183     if (timeLocation < 0) {
00184         return points[0];
00185     } else if (timeLocation > endTime) {
00186         return points[points.size() - 1];
00187     } else {
00188         double numSteps = (double)timeLocation / timeStep;
00189         int beforeIndex = floor(numSteps);
00190         int afterIndex = ceil(numSteps);
00191         if (afterIndex >= points.size()) {
00192             afterIndex = 0;
00193         }
00194         return points[beforeIndex] + (points[afterIndex] - points[beforeIndex])*(numSteps - beforeIndex);
00195     }
00196 }
